meanings.sent1: She resynthesized the ingredients to make a better cake.
meanings.sent2: The scientist resynthesized the compound in the lab.
meanings.sent3: After the mix-up, she resynthesized the puzzle pieces to create the correct image.
meanings.sent4: The artist resynthesized various colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: He resynthesized his notes to ensure he understood the material completely.

meanings.definition: To combine elements to form a new whole.
meanings.sent1: The chef resynthesized the flavors to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent2: The team resynthesized their ideas to come up with a winning strategy.
meanings.sent3: The kids resynthesized their toys to build a giant robot.
meanings.sent4: The author resynthesized different genres to write an innovative novel.
meanings.sent5: She resynthesized her wardrobe by mixing and matching different pieces.
